       <div class="innertube">
        <div id="content">
         <h1>
          Recommended Cleaners in Greenwich and SE London
         </h1>
         <!--<p style="margin-left:-20px;margin-top:10px;position:relative;left:0;">
 -->
         <p class="lastupdated">
          Last updated: 12th April 2018
          <span style="display:inline">
           <a href="https://account.simplybusiness.co.uk/tab/index.htm?sel=link&amp;ebid=149f791c255266251a25adde362cbeb7" id="cleanersbusinessinsurance" rel="no-follow">
            <img alt="cleaning insurance" src="https://account.simplybusiness.co.uk/images/linkoramaWhite.gif" style="float:right;border:none"/>
           </a>
           <!-- Begin FSB code -->
           <a href="http://www.fsb.org.uk/" rel="no-follow">
            <img alt="Federation of Small Businesses Member" src="images/fsblogo_member_white_60.jpg" style="float:right;border:none;"/>
           </a>
           <!-- End FSB link code -->
           <!-- Begin Guild of Master Craftsmen link code -->
           <a href="http://www.findacraftsman.com/member.aspx?id=107840&amp;name=clean+my+residence" rel="no-follow">
            <img alt="The Guild Of Master Craftsmen" src="images/gomclogo.png" style="float:right;border:none; position:relative;left:8px;margin-left:-10px"/>
           </a>
           <!-- End Guild of Master Craftsmen link code -->
          </span>
         </p>
         <p style="padding-top:0;margin-top:0;width:100%">
          With nearly 12 years experience and over 100,000 jobs successfully completed supplying
                   cleaning services direct to pleased households large and small, we are a
                   friendly and professional Domestic Cleaning
                   Agency based in Greenwich,
             			South East London. We introduce
                   households to an insured and experienced
                   domestic cleaner that can be relied upon to
                   provide an efficient and thorough service in
                   your home. Also we provide private housework
                   through organisations such as the NHS.
         </p>
         <p>
          Each cleaner is carefully vetted, and monitored
                   very nearly daily for the first 3 months, after
                   which we continue to maintain regular weekly
                   communication. We keep records on file
                   including ID, proof of address, references etc.
                   We are extremely careful to select only
                   trustworthy people who are of decent character
                   as well as with cleaning experience. We manage
                   this via various interviews, by email, phone
                   and face to face, which include tests to assess
                   character, intelligence and language ability
                   for non native speakers.
         </p>
         <h2 style="color:#69f;padding-bottom:0;margin-bottom:0;">
          Locally based cleaning services in SE London
         </h2>
         <p style="padding-top:0;margin-top:0;">
          Generally our cleaners stay with us, with
                   largely the same clients for many years.
                   However you are free to request a change of
                   cleaner at any time. We are sufficiently
                   confident that we provide a full money back
                   guarantee.
         </p>
         <p style="padding-bottom:0;margin-bottom:0;">
          We work hard to source and vet trustworthy
                   staff who we get to know well, so if you are
                   not sure where to find a reliable and
                   recommended professional cleaner from
          <strong>
           £10.50ph,
          </strong>
          call
          <em>
           today
          </em>
          on 0800 043 3051 / 0208 305
                   8823.
         </p>
         <ul style="margin:1em 0 0 0;padding:0 0 0 1.5em;">
          <li>
           Insured, experienced professional domestic
                   cleaners.
          </li>
          <li>
           Managed regular reliable cleaners.
          </li>
          <li>
           Book a house cleaner for a minimum period
                   of 2 hours.
          </li>
          <li>
           Reliable trustworthy
           <strong>
            vetted
           </strong>
           cleaners.
          </li>
          <li>
           <strong>
            94%
           </strong>
           of our regular clients
                     stay for more than 1 year.
          </li>
          <li>
           No minimum term, no downpayment, no hidden
                   charges.
          </li>
          <li>
           No risk to client (see our Agreement).
          </li>
          <li>
           Offices in Greenwich and Lewisham in South
                   East London.
          </li>
          <li>
           Security minded staff.
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="book.html">
            Book
           </a>
           a
                     professional domestic cleaner today!
          </li>
         </ul>
         <p>
          We understand that the quality of each
                   operative is a significant driving factor in
                   our success. It is our policy therefore to hire
                   only those cleaners that we would love to have
                   work in our own homes. We work hard to find top
                   class domestic cleaners and select them very
                   carefully. Dozens of applications are rejected
                   for each position. We continually receive
                   extremely positive unsolicited feedback on our
                   cleaners. View sample unsolicited
          <a href="testimonials.html" rel="no-follow">
           Testimonials
          </a>
          .
         </p>
         <p>
          See an
          <a href="map.html">
           interactive map
          </a>
          of our offices in South East
                   London.
         </p>
         <h2 style="color:#69f;padding-bottom:0;margin-bottom:0;">
          The CleanMyResidence Cleaner Motto
         </h2>
         <p style="padding-top:0;margin-top:0;">
          “
 
 I will see that every surface is polished, every picture, shelf, ornament dusted using a duster and polish (or micro cloths), floors hoovered and mopped or steamed and if I finish before the time I will find something else to tidy and clean, for example the bathroom cupboard, kitchen cupboard, or oven cleaned, or walls dusted. I will move furniture and clean behind and under, beds, chests of drawers and all.
 ”
         </p>
         <p style="padding-top:0;margin-top:0;">
          Find more time to relax and enjoy life by engaging one of our high quality house cleaners 
 								(In the ten years to February 2018: over 100,000 jobs successfully completed:
          <a href="/testimonials.html" rel="no follow">
           (Testimonials)
          </a>
         </p>
         .
         <p>
          <a href="mailto:contact@cleanmyresidence.co.uk">
           Email
                   us
          </a>
          .
          <span style="">
           Telephone us on 0800 043
                   3051 / 0208 305 8823.
          </span>
         </p>
         <p>
          <span style="">
           <a href="book.html">
            Book
           </a>
           a
                   professional house cleaner today.
          </span>
         </p>
         <div style="font-size:1.3em">

           <strong>

           </strong>
           Apr 12th 2018
          </span>

         <p class="sidewhite" style="padding:5px; margin:0 1em 0 0">
          <span style="color:#000;">
           <span class="blockquote">
            “
           </span>
           “
 					Hi CMR,
 
 ... our cleaner is lovely and does a fine job ...
 
 ”
           <br/>
           <span class="blockquoteright">
            ”

          <span style="margin:1.2em 0 0;padding:10px 0 0 5px;color:black;">
           Carolyn (SE10)

 								-->
        </div>
        <!-- /rbcontent -->
        <div class="rbbotr">
         <div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <!-- /rbroundbox -->
       <!--rb2a1-->
